channel.title: Clinfotracker on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Clinical reminder systems
item.description: Part of a series on reminder systems. -- One of the issues in medical care, especially care for patients with chronic conditions that require ongoing attention and monitoring, is making sure that both doctors and patients are reminded about appointments and tests according to what may be a complex schedule.  On any individual basis this is not too hard to follow, but as a practice gets busy there may be more future events to be aware of than any one person can keep in their head.
